official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to impose an excise tax on certain property transported on inland waterways, and to authorize the collection of a $25 fee for the use of locks along such waterways.
short_title: Commercial Use of Waterways Tax Act

summary.text: Commercial Use of Waterways Tax Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose an excise tax on property transported by carriers on inland waterways. Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to collect a $25 fee for the use of locks along such waterways.

titles.title: Commercial Use of Waterways Tax Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to impose an excise tax on certain property transported on inland waterways, and to authorize the collection of a $25 fee for the use of locks along such waterways.
